message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
I'm willing to be fair, Bob, but time is running out and this money is losing value for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile after inflation. Let's work together.
Bob, this is a serious offer. We're losing money every round. This gives you more than your last offer, even after inflation.
